text: Downward stroke or downstroke can mean: * In handwriting, a downward stroke or downstroke is a ballistic stroke having a direction toward the feet and/or torso of the person * In guitar terminology, a downward stroke or downstroke (better known as downpicking) is a stroke moved in a downward motion, relative to the position of the instrument, against one or more of the strings to make them vibrate
title: Downward stroke
